name: query-gaulish-db
description: Run a SQL query on GaulishDB
author: Phillip Maier

scripts.dev:docker: tsc && docker build -t gaulish . && docker run --rm --env-file=../../../../.env --name gaulish -p 9000:8080 gaulish
scripts.dev:docker:noBuild: docker build -t gaulish . && docker run --rm --env-file=../../../../.env --name gaulish -p 9000:8080 gaulish
